body: Hi Chris, thank you for the response. I have downloaded the data for Bologna: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OrO20Gk*AGrh*rOxVeKhQoiHzbLR7O46Ks9fyOQPECGOfP8OjR2HoQXAvCSZHrGAR8Z9tmmlR76JzmJSg09M3fn2BgvBCnQe/05.JPG) The component now seems to work: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OrO20Gk*AGrJq31uSNtPsWyuJO3p36jym4FKGvT31h-ljNbGtAzo7NXCYq-p7iLwYf*byotVIH4EPKm5*w5ny07PxGRPJ0ed/1.JPG) but I have some difficulties to find [this location](https://www.google.it/maps/place/44%C2%B030'27.6%22N+11%C2%B020'27.3%22E/@44.5076761,11.305887,13z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x0:0x0!8m2!3d44.507678!4d11.340906) in the custom preview below: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OrO20Gk*AGohB5nmnu8sajMm9fWRUEqvyECb1nuUAResCPy-WpZ59vEj5l5wne8qSv9K8NVtZ*1YL*fbN6qBprnnTIrs-M3R/2.JPG)I also tried to "zoom out" modifying the image width height input data but with a value equal or higher than 9000 m it appears an error: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/OrO20Gk*AGpuH9akRAM6ulUqDUZcd1*EtZ5wnpxPLww3Z062O8GV8joRdlUvLNsWcOuXU4Nu1qUsVangKex5qV46OZZwwN7W/3.JPG) Regards, Francesco
